website_summaries.verdict: An affordable and attractive clip-on car air freshener that lets you to take all the benefits of aromatherapy with you when you hit the road.
pros: Comes with 2 essential oil diffusers and 8 reusable felt pads, so you can switch between your favorite essential oils as often as you like
Easily attaches to air conditioning vents with rubber coated non-scratch clips
Beautifully crafted stainless steel lockets stand out from the crowd
cons: Essential oils need to be bought separately

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize it when I bought it but the package includes two diffusers. They come individually wrapped in a cute net-like pack. there are several felt inserts and they are color coded for you to match it with your preferred essence. The entire diffuser is made out of metal. Don't worry, the clips, which is also made of metal, has a coating that will prevent scratching your air vent. the closure is precise and it will not drop the felt piece. My only problem is that I have not found a good oil that would smell good and last more than half a day, but this is not a problem with this product itself.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Pagani

customer_reviews.title: Small and elegant
customer_reviews.text: My car isn't even that elegant, but these are pretty and earthy at the same time. They are a little smaller than I expected, but I have enjoyed them already! I use some almond oil as a carrier oil so that the essential oil scent does not dry out (I live in a very dry climate), and that has helped keep the nice aroma lasting so far!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: A Great Way to have Essential Oils Close By
customer_reviews.text: I have one in my car on my vent and one in my office at work. The one in the car works great, however if you have the vent blowing, it does dry the oil up fairly quickly. If you close the vent, you still get the smell and for a longer time. The one in my office is very subtle since I don't have air blowing through it. It lasts longer than on the car vent and I still smell it as I come in the office or the door closes and moves the air around. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: These aroma car fresheners are awesome. My wife and I love them
customer_reviews.text: These aroma car fresheners are awesome. My wife and I love them. Not only do they work awesome but they look really good in our cars. The only thing is you have to buy your own scented oils. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: GOGO

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Not only do I love the ability to make my own essential oil air freshener, but it could not look better! The metal pieces seem to be top quality with a magnetic clasp for ease of opening and secure closing. The plastic clip secures well to the air vent and also in our camper. The variety of colored felt pad means you can match your decor or have a surprise pop of color. The smell seems to last over a week before you have to refresh the oils. Imagine the summer will require a quicker refresh. Just love these!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn C

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully detailed
customer_reviews.text: Love the set. I loved it so much I bought another set for a friend. They are small so they don't take up all the vent room like a popular candle and lotion store I've shopped at. I don't know where to get scented oil since the pads aren't scented. I do like the choice of colored pads though. I love the "tree of life" design also.
customer_reviews.author: Robin's nest

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: Well I set up two in my truck which is only a one cabin truck. (Chevrolet Silverado) went and picked out a scent to add. Maybe I picked the wrong scent to add so will try a new one. The looks of item is good. The idea behind is great. But here where temps reach 115 in summer we shall see how long it last on that pad.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: nice quality case
customer_reviews.text: Top notch customer service! They helped me and reached out with the issue and I’m now trying the diffuser with a different brand essential oil. The diffuser itself is really pretty and great quality, and the refill pads included.. just can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: maggiebrego

customer_reviews.title: perfect size and function!
customer_reviews.text: i really liked that there were two different tree designs, not just two of the same. it opens magnetically which makes it more convenient than screwing. i like the different color felt discs. i bought it to use in my car and so far it still smells nice and it’s been a couple weeks. perfect size to clip to car vent without obstructing air flow. and the clip prongs are long enough so it actually can clip on to the vent louvres.
customer_reviews.author: klc bulldog

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a must gift giver I would buy this for any little party or any office thing or just for a loved one that you want that little extra gift. I love mine. Especially if you like essential oil’s it is perfect and the packaging is really cute. Now you can always have any fragrance you want inside your car I’ll like mine does Mika’s boss so you can’t get those cents just anywhere it always has to come from your essential oil’s so this is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani June-Yeates

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: The quality and style of this product is awesome. The ability to add your own essential oil scents is a major bonus as well. Too bad the scent does not last as long as some of the commercial products, but that is to be expected since you are using essential oils and not fake aromas produced in a factory.
customer_reviews.author: E. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Cute and packs a powerful punch!
customer_reviews.text: I needed Something that would last longer than my febreeze air freshener for my car. I was Excited to see these arrive in the cute linen bag. I gave One to my husband for his Jeep. I also liked the variety of colors to chose from the pads. They look bigger online than in person but they are made with quality metal and aesthetically it looks great in my vehicle. The essential oils I ordered Work well with this item. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: Anjaneen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stainless steel diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I really like these beautiful stainless steel car Diffuser, with changeable felts...Awesome and at a great price..you can also add your own essential oils to the felt, it looks like the diffuser is glowing a bright color, very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Pretty! But does not retain scent
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these look - I have them in my car and love looking at them! The metal/silver is bright and sharp looking. Unfortunately, the felt pads do no really retain the scent of essential oils, much longer than a few minutes. I keep them because of how they look, but have given up on having them function as a scented item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty, but...
customer_reviews.text: The pads do not hold scents. I soaked these suckers with lavender essential oil and my car was scented for all of 2 days at best. Disappointing, especially since they are so cute.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 sets of these, and keep buying them as gifts! I recently bought a set and one of the clips did not shut properly. So I reached out to the seller, as they had written to me to thank me for my purchase. I spoke with Nancy and she was very apologetic, and offered to send me a replacement right away! I received the new one quickly and it works perfectly. So not only are these much better and prettier than any chemical ridden air fresheners but their customer service is extraordinary as well. I love these clips and will continue to buy them!! Thank you RoyAroma.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they are so beautiful. I hate car air fresheners they usually smell horrible and they are extremely toxic so I love being able to use essential oils to scent my car. My only issue is that my vents are vertical the trees are made for horizontal vents so they let sideways. Make sure you get non-directional designs of you have vertical vents. I would love to get trees that can go on my vents, they are beautiful designs
customer_reviews.author: P. Raney

customer_reviews.title: As Described.
customer_reviews.text: You get two lockets with this seller. I had purchased this item (not exactly identical, the clip is different but it was also stainless steel) from another seller for almost the same price for only one piece. There is a picture where it shows an eye dropper being used to apply the oil. Just FYI, the dropper isn't included.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas W.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and elegant
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a new car and wanted the ultimate air freshener that is also a healthy alternative to artificial chemicals scents. Arrived in beautiful packaging in extremely easy to change out the color discs and resent. I refill with my own essential oil’s in the new car smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K

customer_reviews.title: Not worth my effort and disappointed with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very cute..smaller than I thought. The reason I bought these was to save money on car air freshners that it seemed as if I was buying much too frequently. When you take the trouble to add the essential oils to the felt pad, the scent only lasts for one day. Now instead of spending the money to replace my car air freshner, I have to go through the trouble of applying the oils every day. Not worth my effort and disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jerz

customer_reviews.title: Not Fragrant Enough
customer_reviews.text: I think the product itself is made well but I just cannot smell the oil whatsoever. I attached it to my AC vent and smelled it immediately because I had put so much on the felt piece, however the minute I turned the air on I stopped smelling the oil.
customer_reviews.author: Moni

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Useable packaging!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these! Durable. Sturdy. Well made! The cloth disks are so colorful! Easy to attach! I was most impressed with the thoughtful packaging! An excellent purchase. My entire car smells like patchouli oil now! (Oil not included)
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Thurman

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: So far I have not been able to detect the aroma that I used. I'm all fairness though, I think one needs to run the air or heat in the vehicle. Both of which right now I have not had to use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mang

customer_reviews.title: Well made/sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Not only are the fresheners made out of metal instead of cheap plastic, but they are packaged so nicely. Each is in its own individual blue mesh pouch and the whole package came in a canvas drawstring pouche with a cute design.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Aroma therapy for your car.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I can change the oil/scent any time I like. I keep refills in the glove box, so I know my car will always have that pleasant aroma. These are far more attractive than the expensive, disposable fresheners that I was using before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonner

customer_reviews.title: No aroma
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed because these were purchased for my car. There is absolutely no smell from any of them. They arrived in a sealed pouch and have been kept in it. No smell from day one.
customer_reviews.author: Midget

customer_reviews.title: These are small
customer_reviews.text: I guess I need to brush up on millimeters and scale because these are TINY. I guess I was expecting something similar to Bath & Body Works car clips. I do feel like the scent doesn’t last more than a day or two, even with 4-5 drops of oil but everything was as described, it was more an issue of me not being naive.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to freshen up my car
customer_reviews.text: Love using natural products to freshen up a space & this is not only nice to look at, but it came in such a cute package. My car now smells brand new & its 2 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for your car interior
customer_reviews.text: I thought they would be bigger, but thank the Lord they are not fit perfectly and work very well . I am using different scents and when I find one or two I really like , I will switch on and off. Incidentally, the holder is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Crzhorse5a

customer_reviews.title: It's good overall
customer_reviews.text: I love natural soothing smells like peppermint, lavender and lemon that's why I was so happy to find this option instead of the ones offered at the stores, however I did find that the smells don't last as long as the store bought ones so i did end up having to add more oil and I did use both of the aroma pieces. I placed one on each side of the car vents and that made the smell disperse throughout the car a lot more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love how they look in my car!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these for me as a surprise, and I love them! I have a black Traverse and they look so pretty in my car. As many of the reviews mention, some scented oils do not last long, but so far I do not mind. I usually place a couple of drops in each one about once a week and it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: beutiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: I used it in my car and my boyfriend ended up stealing it and using one in his because he liked the way it made his car smell nice. Well made and love it! Also great gift! Bought a second set for Christmas gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Kam

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I think these are very nice, easy to clip on vent, magnetic closure, the scent come threw easily and the key are a nice quality. I will be ordering more for my daughters vehicles
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful to look at, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I think they’re beautiful! My best friend saw them for the first time today and thought so too! It’s so easy to soak the pads down and put them in the holders. Popping them in the vents was a breeze. The aroma of the lavender I used is lovely. These make it easy and quite lovely to have your car smelling great!
customer_reviews.author: kayleebirdy

customer_reviews.title: Works well in car
customer_reviews.text: These have a milder scent than most car deodorizers and I prefer that. The scent doesn't overwhelm. You also get to pick the scent you want via essential oils.
customer_reviews.author: Blind Girl Grunt

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold scent long
customer_reviews.text: They are really pretty and come with bright color pads to switch out which looks very pleasing in my car. My only problem is that it does not hold the scent for longer than a day, so i have to constantly put in oil.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna G

customer_reviews.title: Very very worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: these are absolutely awesome I will be absolutely ordering more and using them as gifts as well They are very sturdily constructed and I doubt they will ever break like some of the ones with plastic clips do. These are constructed with some sort of metal that is coated with like plastic or rubber on the clip part. They look gorgeous in the car and they shipping was very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These lockets are very pretty!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these lockets!! Stainless steel, high quality material... The felts are of nice colors, vibrant colors. Because they are a bit smaller, there is a constant need to put oils back on to the felt. Overall, I am very happy with my purchases, I bought 2 sets, 1 set per car! Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Chaun425

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! Very nice quality, heavy duty, and also very pretty! Even the scent pads are great quality! Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love aroma clip. Brought for my car and loved it. Loved it so much I brought it for my mother's car also. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smalls

customer_reviews.title: Classy and gives a nice touch
customer_reviews.text: So classy and looks great in the car. It looks so much better than those clip on fragrances that you buy at the grocery store. You can put your favorite scent and it holds up the fragrance
customer_reviews.author: Reeses

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: They look really cute in my car but they don’t really give off as much of the essential oil scents as I would have liked. It’s more of a very subtle hint of whatever oil you’ve used in my opinion. The packaging they come in is nice though! I like them best as decoration more than something to make your car smell good.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: must use high quality essential oil - not sure how long scent lasts
customer_reviews.text: I think these aromatherapy air fresheners are adorable. I tried one in a car and couldn't smell anything, so perhaps the quality of the essential oil (EO) was the reason. I'm trying a second one, and used a very good quality EO. It seems more fragrant, but haven't put it in the car yet. I'd rather inhale something healthy like a nice EO versus chemicals like so many traditional air fresheners. I don't know how often the EO has to be refreshed, but if it isn't often, I'll be glad to improve my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Looks good on the vent in the car while providing whatever scent you choose. Have bought (3) for gifts and will buy additional for Christmas! Loved by all. Great find.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great protuct
customer_reviews.text: i love this, it makes my car smell wonderful! The only small issue is it does not clip on my vents the best
customer_reviews.author: Dougie Fresh

customer_reviews.title: Earth friendly 🌍
customer_reviews.text: Long Lasting smell great! I know it’s so much healthier than other car refreshers! And also saves the environment. Keep in mind it does not come with the oils.
customer_reviews.author: Fucker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: Needed a little pick me up for the interior of my the car. These are perfect and adds a little shines decor instead of just some pc of plastic or a cardboard tree.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Good construction. Be warned: only use a few drops of the essential oils into the pad. Don't drench the pad.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Pretty scents
customer_reviews.text: These are super pretty and do permeate a great smell in my car, when the heat is on. I haven't tried them with the air due to the time of year. I do need to put more drops of oil on every few days to keep the fragrance, (which is why I didn't give 5 stars), but it allows me to change my fragrant mood. These also seem quite durable and heavy. I feel the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Now I can Use my Essential Oils in my Car
customer_reviews.text: Very Easy to use just put your essential oil on the felt pad ( comes with several ) slide into the holder and clip on your car vent and off you go enjoying a nice relaxing ride. This time of year with all the traffic and Holiday stress definitely need some essential oil for relaxation. Good quality and the design is a nice addition to my car. Not to big about the size of a quarter and the grip is strong ( does not slide off of the vent ).
customer_reviews.author: JANNIE RANKIN

customer_reviews.title: Great little gadgets
customer_reviews.text: These little EO car fresheners are great! They come with a bunch of replacement inserts and are very good quality! They close with a strong magnet! They’re smaller than I expected which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: JRubbo

customer_reviews.title: nice weight and very pretty
customer_reviews.text: They are great hook on vent nicely and very pretty the oil diffusing pads are nice and the smell goes through the car nicely. I just love them
customer_reviews.author: Queen Bee

customer_reviews.title: nice looking
customer_reviews.text: They are very nice looking. the felt just didn't hold the scent as long as I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: K. P

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful scent cases! Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: They arrived on time. Came in a nice casing and look beautiful on my car. The look of these scent cases bring a sense a peace while I drive. Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: First off these are such great quality! They are heavy and durable. Super cute and tiny, however I would have to purchase a more intense oil because the one I am using is very faint, definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It was a Christmas gift for my husband, who as an hour commute after an 18-hour day, who is also skeptical about oils but has been using it and loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Well crafted
customer_reviews.text: Well made and beautiful. But, a couple of drops of oil last a few hours at the most. You need to be constantly refilling it, which is kind of too much work for me...
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, though it doesn’t sit very well on my vents in my truck. Nice if you want to utilize your essential oils for scent in your vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: J. N. I.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order. The first order was a gift and they were pleased, so I ordered these for myself. Love the quality and the tree cutout. Grateful to have a way to use essential oils in my vehicles. Very pleased with these vent clips!
customer_reviews.author: Daphne

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality and more sturdy than I was expecting. It just takes a couple of drops of essential oils and my car smells wonderful. I ended up buying a second pair for my sister because I liked them so much.
customer_reviews.author: smain

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty but minimal freshness
customer_reviews.text: The first two days provides a nice aroma ( I went with eucalyptus) and then nothing. I do not want to keep the oil in my car but feel that is the only way the sponge will be effective. The design and idea are lovely but you do have to add oil or a new sponge weekly, not monthly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I added my won essential oils and put them in my car first thing!!! i love them! thank YOU!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Stoddard

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT !
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product !! It is well made and was packed very nicely . I bought this for my wife / she immediately has me order one for her sister , she loved it so much !!
customer_reviews.author: Beth A

customer_reviews.title: The low pollution solution to car air fresheners
customer_reviews.text: No single use plastic. Just keep adding essential oils to the felt pads.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: door doesn't open all the way making it difficult to add oil
customer_reviews.text: They're not bad but the door doesn't open all the way making it difficult to drop oil onto the pad while its in the holder. I was given a similar product but another brand as a gift and the door opened all the way. I much prefer the other brand and was really disappointed when I bought these for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Jonna

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sleek tree air freshener
customer_reviews.text: Great car air freshener. The design is very cute and sleek. Love it and highly recommend...plus it came with 2 as wells as several replacement pads
customer_reviews.author: Hima50

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clip on to my vent and the air ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm really enjoying incorporating essential oils into my daily driving with these. Easy to clip on to my vent and the air helps disperse scents. Was smaller than I imagined, but that's kind of nice. The metal can get hot when heat is on full blast, so just be aware when switching or adding oils.
customer_reviews.author: C.J.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Addition
customer_reviews.text: It’s a lovely addition to my car. It’s an easy way to diffuse my essential oils without water.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia H. Novak

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great product. It's easy to open and insert the pads with whatever essential oil you choose. I put 8 drops on mine and that seemed to fill my car quickly (not overwhelming btw). And it's much better to look at than those store bought ones. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: TRizzle

customer_reviews.title: I love them !
customer_reviews.text: I love them ! I started with one now I have 3 in my truck ! And I’m thinking one for my backseat vent ! As long as you don’t put to much oil on the pad ur all good !
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: It’s amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my car aromatherapy clips they look great and I can add any essential oil to the little pad to comes to insert in it so it’s not the same sent all the time
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Can’t smell a thing
customer_reviews.text: I love the tree design but these don’t work. Even if I saturate the felt and turn the air on high, you can’t smell a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Peters

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and well made. My car smells great - I don’t really care for commercial air freshener products and am happy to be able to use essential oils instead. My car smells like lavender now instead of my son’s stinky soccer cleats. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Krause

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy having this little diffuser in my car
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy having this little diffuser in my car. Holds the oil for a long time. Good price for a two pack as well
customer_reviews.author: Jamifrakes

customer_reviews.title: Not what was expected!
customer_reviews.text: Cute item, no scent to the little pads that come with the clip. That was the whole reason for the purchase! plus they all are in the same little bag so the scent would mix with all the others. Not a product to purchase! So it is necessary to purchase your own essential oil to put on the pads.
customer_reviews.author: debi m.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product just doesn’t work as described
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be of good quality however there is no scent after I add the essential oils to the felt pad and place them in the car vent as instructed. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: RHuber

customer_reviews.title: Car smells nice!
customer_reviews.text: Such an easy way to continually keep the car smelling nice!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice sturdy piece. Not plastic. Works great in the car. I would redo the scent every week but will freshen your car for a good month without changing or adding anything. Great piece
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. I ordered a similar product from another ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. I ordered a similar product from another vendor and it broke the first time I tried to use it. These are made much stronger and even feel heavier. Wish I would have found RoyAroma the first time. Received very quickly in awesome condition. Definitely recommend, definitely will buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: Dana L Gmuer

customer_reviews.title: Aromatherapy holders
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the holder. No scents. I had my own essential oils. Doing a very good job in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and very effective!
customer_reviews.text: I took our car for a drive today and asked my wife what oil she put in this today- she didn’t. It was over 2 weeks since she had. Very effective and easy to attach to vent. Looks stylish too!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun McCans

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my car as a air freshener/ diffuser. Super easy to use. Very pretty design. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Zhanna

customer_reviews.title: A gift that keeps on giving!
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old granddaughter received these to use in her car beginning on this drive of freedom birthday! Don't know what scent she will choose for her chariot, but it will add to the pleasure I'm sure!
customer_reviews.author: carolinadawn

customer_reviews.title: So so...
customer_reviews.text: Cute item but no matter how much eseential oil of good quality I add the smell doesnt seem to last long or make a difference in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful. They're well made and work really well. I received them quickly and they are just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Zoner51

customer_reviews.title: Lovely diffuser
customer_reviews.text: Obviously, you have to add your oils but the quality of the diffuser is quite high. Sturdy, snappy lid, felt pads fit perfectly. The only bummer is if you have vertical vents, the tree design presents sideways.
customer_reviews.author: Janine S. Wells

customer_reviews.title: They look great!
customer_reviews.text: I have these in my Jeep.. totally love them. Every time I get into my car they look and smell wonderful! I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for Valentine's Day. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J. Tissari

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely beautiful and work fabulously in my vehicle... Would highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: Gave as a gift and they loved it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift to give and was really appreciated by my friend. Good idea for future gifts.
customer_reviews.author: carolh895

customer_reviews.title: No power needed
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful to add an essential oil to and place in the car. The scent lasts for days and you don't even have to run the car to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Good quality and comes in thoughtful packaging. Might buy a couple more as gifts. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Buy it!! I've put a decent amount of essential oil in the pad and I still smell the scent even if it's over a week now. The material does not look cheap too.
customer_reviews.author: Jim & Tina Petrie

customer_reviews.title: Scent doesn't last in them
customer_reviews.text: The scent only lasted in my car for about two days before I had to change the pads that came with it and put more oils on it.
customer_reviews.author: Skyenne Mach

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice item. Metal is good and looks good, too.
customer_reviews.author: wj

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it long but it nice quality so I am sure it will hold up amazing
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Love My Auto Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: Received the Aromatherapy Essential Oil Diffuser, as a gift, for my Jeep and absolutely love it. It looks great and I love being able to use the scent of my choice. I have bought more, one for our other car's and some for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Lyda

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the mone!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Like car jewelry. Had to order two more as gifts. I know my friends would appreciate them. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Achdah R.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: These are very pretty. I also didn't realize that you actually get 2 in the pack.
customer_reviews.author: Mimix5

customer_reviews.title: Love thesw
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Good quality and make my car smell so nice :) better than using a car freshener and looks super cute
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Loewen

product_meta.title: RoyAroma 2PCS 30mm Car Aromatherapy Essential Oil Diffuser Stainless Steel Locket with Vent Clip 12 Felt Pads
feature_bullets: You will get TWO diffuser Lockets!30mm different Tree of Life pattern diffusers with 22mm felt pads. Choose Two car diffusers to get more aroma.

Premium 316L stainless steel material, smooth surface, strong magnetic closure, long lifetime. Come with 12 felt pads, different colors,felt pad size is 22mm in diameter, thickened pads, absorb essential oil easily. RoyAroma provides 22mm replacement felt pads
Relieve your stress and keep alert when you drive. Aroma around you, bring you good mood. Minimize some smell you don’t like. Use your favorate essential oil to enjoy your daily life, your trip.

A convenient and simple air freshener for your car, small space, nice decoration. You can also use them at home or office. It is a great gift for yourself, your family or your friends. Packing includes: 2 lockets+12 different felt pads. DO NOT INCLUDE ESSENTIAL OIL.

Usage: Apply a few drops of your essential oil to one felt pad, put it inside the 30mm car locket. Easily to clip on car air-conditioning vent, place it on office desk, use it at home or any other proper places that you prefer.
